import React from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import Sale01 from '../components/sale/Sale01'; import { Tab, Tabs, TabList, TabPanel } from 'react-tabs'; import 'react-tabs/style/react-tabs.css'; import PageTitle from '../components/pagetitle'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import img from '../assets/images/icon/qrcode.png' Login.propTypes = { }; function Login(props) { return (

Login To Rockie

Welcome back! Log In now to start trading

https://accounts.rockie.com/login

Email
Mobile

Forgot Password?

Not a member?

Register

Forgot Password?

Login with QR code

Scan this code with the Rockie mobile app
to log in instantly.

); } export default Login;
